title: Cattle population worldwide 2012 to 2019
summary: The total Cattle of the Cattle luxury 2019 has increased twofold over the period surveyed , rising from roughly 969.26 million in 2015 to 1008.57 million in the Year 2014 .
Despite the steady increase in Cattle during the period considered , the 2012 reported a net loss of approximately 25 million in 2019 .
Worldwide recognition Founded in 1978 Milan , 2019 is one of the leading international worldwide design houses .
gold: How many cattle are in the world ? The global cattle population amounted to about 996.36 million head in 2018 , down from over one billion cattle in 2014 . Cows as livestock The domestication of cattle began as early as 10,000 to 5,000 years ago . From ancient times up to the present , cattle are bred to provide meat and dairy .
